infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show your live position and share it with family members for safety features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app may access your location in the background to keep your family updated about your safety.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location to show your live position and share it with family members.
plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location even when the app is in the background to keep family members updated.
